Class WorldMapSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • WorldMapSquare

  • public class WorldMapSquare
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes each grid square of the WorldMap. Has a chance of holding a Monster.
    Version:
    Apr 27, 2018
    Author:
    , Period: 4, Assignment: Adventure, Sources: TODO

      • WorldMapSquare

        public WorldMapSquare(Square s,
                      int d)
        Creates a grid square
        Parameters:

        d - the probability there will be a monster on the square

        public boolean checkMonster()
        Returns true (danger / 100) the time
        Returns:
        true if there is a monster, false if not

      • setCharacter

        public void setCharacter(Square s)
        Set a new character to be displayed
        Parameters:

      • visit

        public void visit(Player p)
        Sets visited to true when the Player is on the square. If the Player hasn't visited the square before, it calls to make the WorldMapSquare have an effect on the Player's stats.
        Parameters:
        p - the Player to visit the square and be influenced by the square.

      • visited

        public boolean visited()
        Returns whether the player has visited the square before or not
        Returns:
        true if the player has visited the square before. false if the player hasn't.

      • isExit

        public boolean isExit()
        Returns whether this square is the exit.
        Returns:
        true if the square is an exit. (the "exit" field)
